de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.lance.lca.container

Interface ContainerManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DockerContainerManager, PlainContainerManager

    public interface ContainerManager
    an implementation of this interface controls all containers asscociated with a particular lifecycle agent (there is one LifecycleAgent per node and one ContainerManager per lifecycle agent)
    Author:
    Joerg Domaschka
